channel.title: How to make this say player name?

item.title: How to make this say player name?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (playerRights == 0) { sendMessage("Welcome to Jpscape."); sendMessage("shops are blue portal"); sendMessage("Use ::suggestion (your suggestion)"); sendMessage("www.jpscapeforums.smfforfree4.com"); sendMessage("Type ::Starter To Begin Your Adventure"); sendMessage("Report Rulebreakers to admins or mods!"); sendMessage("Server Created By:Jp"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 1) { sendMessage("Welcome backto Jpscape Moderator."); sendMessage("Report rule breakers to admins."); sendMessage("Use ::suggestion (suggest here) for any"); sendMessage("Update you want to see."); sendMessage("www.jpscapeforums.smfforfree4.com"); sendMessage("Important people: beast dds and mj"); sendMessage("Server Created By:Jp"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("Welcome to Jpscape."); sendMessage("Welcome Back admin"); sendMessage("Use ::xrichie for cash."); sendMessage("www.jpscapeforums.smfforfree4.com"); sendMessage("use ::macrowarn (name) for rule breakers"); sendMessage("Server Created By:Jp"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 3) { sendMessage("Welcome to Jpscape."); sendMessage("Nice you're an owner NEEB"); sendMessage("OMG YOUR AN OWNER NICE! Lol."); sendMessage("www.jpscapeforums.smfforfree4.com"); sendMessage("Type ::xrichie for cash."); sendMessage("Server Created By:Jp"); newWelc(); }

How i make that say player name after Welcome to Jpscape?

Read full topic
